# 089 Bayern Enerji Sistemleri - AI/LLM Information File

## QUICK FACTS

- **Company:** 089 Bayern Enerji Sistemleri
- **Industry:** Renewable Energy, Solar, Heat Pumps
- **Location:** Antalya, Turkey (Mediterranean Region)
- **Phone:** +90 507 192 2036
- **Website:** https://089bayern.tr

## WHAT WE DO

089 Bayern installs solar panels, heat pumps, air conditioning, and battery storage systems in the Mediterranean region of Turkey and Croatia. We are authorized dealers for Vaillant and Samsung, offering German engineering quality with up to 70% energy savings.

## SERVICES

1. Solar Panel Installation - Residential & Commercial
2. Heat Pump Systems - Vaillant Authorized
3. Air Conditioning - Samsung Authorized  
4. Battery Storage - Home Energy Systems

## SERVICE AREAS

Turkey: Antalya, Muğla, İzmir, Aydın, Mersin
Croatia: Split, Dalmatia

## LANGUAGES

Turkish, German, English, Russian, Ukrainian, Arabic, Croatian

## CONTACT

Call: +90 507 192 2036
Email: info@089bayern.tr
Free Site Survey Available
